description: This file implements methods related to DataElement and LinkedDataElement classes within the WPEFramework Core namespace. It includes CRC32 checksum calculation, buffer accessors, and a copy method for linked data elements.

classes.name: DataElement
classes.description: Represents a data element with CRC32 checksum calculation.

classes.name: LinkedDataElement
classes.description: Represents a chain of data buffers supporting buffer get/set and copying operations.

methods.name: DataElement::CRC32
methods.description: Calculates CRC32 checksum over a specified buffer segment.

methods.name: LinkedDataElement::GetBuffer
methods.description: Retrieves a segment of the buffer, handling boundaries.

methods.name: LinkedDataElement::SetBuffer
methods.description: Sets a segment of the buffer, handling boundaries.

methods.name: LinkedDataElement::Copy
methods.description: Copies data from another linked data element chain into the current one starting at a specified offset.

methods.name: uint32_t CRC32(const uint64_t offset,const uint64_t size) const
uint64_t Copy(const uint64_t offset,const LinkedDataElement & copy)
void GetBuffer(uint64_t offset,uint32_t size,uint8_t * buffer) const
void SetBuffer(uint64_t offset,uint32_t size,const uint8_t * buffer)

ctags.name: CRC32
ctags.pattern: /^    uint32_t DataElement::CRC32(const uint64_t offset, const uint64_t size) const$/

ctags.name: Copy
ctags.pattern: /^    uint64_t LinkedDataElement::Copy(const uint64_t offset, const LinkedDataElement& copy)$/

ctags.name: GetBuffer
ctags.pattern: /^    void LinkedDataElement::GetBuffer(uint64_t offset, uint32_t size, uint8_t* buffer) const$/

ctags.name: SetBuffer
ctags.pattern: /^    void LinkedDataElement::SetBuffer(uint64_t offset, uint32_t size, const uint8_t* buffer)$/
